bibl.title: Transition and Change in Diocletian's Egypt: Province and Empire in the Late Third Century.
Approaching Late Antiquity. The Transformation from Early to Late Empire
bibl.author: ADAMS, C.

bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 76 (2004), Bibl. Beilage 3, p. 153.
bibl.seg: ADAMS C., Transition and Change in Diocletian's Egypt: Province and Empire in the Late Third Century.
Simon SWAIN and Mark EDWARDS (Edd.), Approaching Late Antiquity. The Transformation from Early to Late Empire (Oxford, 2004) pp. 82-108.
